name: Recipies
tagline: a collection of recipies, that i adjusted to my taste. Since i continually try to improve them, i sometimes need to get back to my previous version - hence a git repo
body:
# recipies - a collection

some recipies, that evolve over time and hence might need some kind of version management, since not all changes are for the better ;)

and since there is git, changes can be tracked ... and published here
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
